steps.subheader: Connecting You to Innovative Therapies and Compassionate Care.

steps.header: How would you describe your situation?

options.label: Research/Investigation
options.description: You have a condition that wasn't easily diagnosed and needs to be investigated further.
options.name: situation

options.label: Compassionate Use/Expanded Access
options.description: You need access to a novel therapy not publicly available.
options.name: situation

options.label: Clinical Trial
options.description: You need access to a clinical study for a novel therapy that is not yet approved.
options.name: situation

options.label: Access to Approved Therapy
options.description: You need access to an approved therapy that's currently unavailable to you.
options.name: situation
